executiveSummary: Amelia Cos and Brian Thomas, co-founders of Popup Play from Austin, Texas, pitched their company seeking $250,000 for 6% equity. Despite low consumer sales, Chris Sacca offered to invest $250,000 under the same terms as their previous investors, which the founders accepted.
keyDecisions: Chris Sacca invested $250,000 on the same $3 million valuation terms as prior investors.
nextSteps: Popup Play will proceed with Chris Saccaâ€™s investment and continue developing partnerships with major brands to expand their product reach.
